body:
+1 for circular padding.

I've temporarily used the [repeat and crop solution](https://github.com/pytorch/pytorch/issues/3858) given by @zou3519 but it seems much slower than other native padding functions (replication, reflection).

While waiting for implementation is there any way to avoid unneeded memory allocation from repeat()?
